# SmartContract.prepare() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

Prepare a transaction for sending

**Signature:**

```typescript
prepare<TMethod extends keyof TContract["functions"] = keyof TContract["functions"]>(method: string & TMethod, args: any[] & Parameters<TContract["functions"][TMethod]>, overrides?: CallOverrides): Transaction<Omit<{
        receipt: import("@ethersproject/abstract-provider").TransactionReceipt;
        data: () => Promise<unknown>;
    }, "data">>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                | Description  |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------ |
| method    | string &amp; TMethod                                                |              |
| args      | any\[\] &amp; Parameters&lt;TContract\["functions"\]\[TMethod\]&gt; |              |
| overrides | CallOverrides                                                       | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

[Transaction](./sdk.transaction.md)&lt;Omit&lt;{ receipt: import("@ethersproject/abstract-provider").TransactionReceipt; data: () =&gt; Promise&lt;unknown&gt;; }, "data"&gt;&gt;
